name: Get Off My Space!
description: Get Off My Space! is a tower defense game where you rely on skillful tower placement and resource management to beat upcoming dangers of the galaxy. Combining strategy and micro managing fire groups you will overcome the hardest level objectives.

name: Tavern Crawl
description: Tavern Crawl is a alcohol-fueled adventure starring Fish, a young mouse on a quest to save his kingdom’s supply of booze from a gang of thieving rats through combat and crafting cocktails.

name: Pixel Trouble
description: Pixel trouble - In this unusual platformer, you take on the role of a dim-witted knight who decided to become famous by accomplishing several feats. He chose the ghosts who fled from the cemetery as his goal, but here's the bad luck - the sword cannot injure the undead!

name: I Am Butter
description: I AM BUTTER is an adventure story-driven platformer which you will play as a piece of butter and go on adventures in various scenarios, solving puzzles and exploring the unknown. You will encounter a variety of NPCs, talk to them during your adventure. The truth will gradually unfold.

name: Hellfire 1988: An Oregon Story
description: Hellfire 1988: An Oregon Story is a story-rich hybrid point-and-click adventure/visual-novel game. Featuring a 30,000 word interactive script, hundreds of story choices, challenging puzzles, and a thrilling soundtrack, Hellfire 1988 is a provocative and compelling adventure game experience.

name: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
description: This game is a casual game, players can experience a different roller coaster ride with a helmet. Players can control the running speed of the roller coaster by themselves, which can not only experience the thrill at high speed, but also stop to enjoy the beautiful scenery.

name: Sel Quinta: The Six City Quest

name: Brave Princess Milia

You are able to travel,fight monsters and enjoy various event around this fantasy world by controlling the strongest hero.

name: 3D Puzzle: Wood House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven - Part Three
description: Zombie Exodus: Safe Haven: Part Three continues your story as you leave your hilltop outside Nightfall, Colorado with your group of survivors and travel to a new haven, a rural junkyard.

name: Plumb
description: A room-scale VR narrative puzzle game. Solve spatial puzzles under strict time constraints. Assemble and properly combine an assortment of 3d shapes into predefined spaces.

name: Last Lovers
description: This is a visual novel about the doomsday zombie.This work is a multi line and multi ending eschatological love song and a visual novel of all age love.

name: Psycho
description: Psycho - is an exciting 3D shooter with hardcore elements where you will explore an abandoned psychiatric hospital playing as a fighter SWAT.

name: Ancient Medieval Empire
description: Ancient Medieval Empire is a strategy game with RPG elements. A huge number of free castles and villages, which greatly attract the evil orcs. Manage your army, capture new castles and fight back against enemies. You have to capture as many castles as possible and drive away the orcs.

name: Ts Fantasy
description: Date with Cute Girls as you save people! This is new Adventure Visual Novel game!! Explore Ts Fantasy, and save the world using your special powers and with the help of your friends. Your relationship with characters differs according to the choices you make!!

name: Hero for Hire
description: Open world RPG where every quest is small puzzle.

name: Kongfu VR
description: The earth was invaded by the demon race again.This time, they have gathered ancient fierce beasts. As one of the most valiant warriors, Defend them with your weapons! - Defend! The! Frontier!

name: Project Xmas
description: Project XMAS is a retro style, horror, single - player game where you need to return to your home... The map is completely procedurallygenerated so every approach will be differend and specific.

name: Space Piercer
description: make your way into their fleets to destroy them on their own field !

name: Pow! 2
description: Great precision puzzles with physics!! You must help Spike, the Blue Ball, and take him to the target platform with the help of your friends. Calculate the timers, configure the friends, hit play, and watch the action! And remember, each second matters!

name: Death Damnation
description: Death Damnation is a Twitch connected game developed for streamers. You and your community are in charge of controlling the paranormal events and dreadful monsters. Be sure that your viewers are on your side to escape death, otherwise you will have a bad time.

name: Second World
description: In Second World, you have to take on the role of a little demon who needs to get out of the lost world and return home. On a way you will meet a lot of deadly traps and monsters that will do anything for you to stay in this strange and at the same time frightening world.

name: MultiVerse
description: A Multiplayer game with PVP PVE PVPE

name: Isolate
description: You, who needed money, will participate in a secret biological experiment. You will play a 'Game' in a huge cellar for two weeks and have to survive the attack of numerous 'Entities'. What are those 'Entities', and who is waiting at the top of the cellar?

name: Charlie in the Moistverse of Madness
description: Charlie in the Moistverse of madness is a small fangame made to celebrate the amazing Moistverse meme that took the world by storm. Feel the power of screaming "YEAA BABY" from the top of your lungs to put fear on your enemie's hearts. This game truly makes you feel.. like Critical.

name: Barry of Wrath
description: A fantasy adventure that will take the players on a journey they wanted nothing to do with!

name: Light, Dark or Hrak?
description: A simple hard worker living in the village of Zalupkino is doing his job, when suddenly there are power outages in the village, by a lucky chance our hero has an electrician pig and the right tool, taking a tractor, they went to look for a malfunction at the substation, what could go wrong?

name: Midnight Terror: The Beginning
description: Ethan, um agente da SWAT entra na prefeitura de uma cidade infestada de monstros com a missão de encontrar sobreviventes ao ataque de um vírus desconhecido. Jogo indie de Survivor Horror em 3ª Pessoa feito por uma única pessoa no motor gráfico Unreal Engine 4.

name: Riki's Risky Ride
description: Riki’s Risky Ride is a challenging 2.5D Platformer. Drive, spin, jump your car to reach the top of the city.

name: Astral Slider
description: Astral Slider is an immersive time-attack laser racer. Slide through a number of different astral cyberworlds and blast your way past obstacles to increase your speed and beat your top scores. Play flatscreen or in VR.

name: Erannorth Chronicles: Ancient Ruins
description: Experience a richer, more distinct and dangerous world with the first Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Ancient Ruins" will expand the world seamlessly with new Challenges, events, deadly bosses and new loot; suitable for mid to high level characters.

name: Koncolos
description: Explore the hidden aspects of a living left ages behind, where ordinary folk, mages and monsters live together. Koncolos: Prologue is a visual novel that tells the story of common people taking on legendary monsters.

name: Treasure Sprinter
description: In every adventure film, there is always a scene: the hero finally obtains the treasure, but has to walk through the maze of traps in order to leave alive. Temple run is such a scenario. This game is very interesting

name: Earth is too small for me
description: A simple TPS game. The strongest man is back. Manipulate "The Strongest Legend" and infiltrate the enemy dungeon. Of course, please don't forget to rescue the lady !

name: Sharing Lights
description: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.

name: Homunculus Hotel
description: Explore the floors of the mysterious Homunculus Hotel and help its guests understanding their dreams.

name: Panelki
description: A utility worker earns for a ticket to leave the endless Siberian city of panel houses. Permafrost, day/night cycle, dynamic weather and open world. Feel the atmosphere of the northern city, having been in the role of a handyman.

name: Nerraia
description: In this platform and adventure game, you will play for 3 different stage to save the Nitia island.

name: Burning Horns
description: Burning Horns is a Bara Isekai JRPG that takes place in a realm in which free love has always been the rule until a demon popped up trying to destroy everything. Go on a hunt, Choose your partners, Make choices, Bring back the colors to a fantastical realm, and Return to your home!

name: Bouldering Robot 3D
description: Bouldering action game!This robot can neither walk nor jump.Only hang and shift its weight.Swing and Jump as you head for the goal at the top!Total 9 stages

name: HellFull: The Last Hope
description: Immerse yourself in a unique post-apocalyptic world that has now become Hell on earth. Destroy your enemies with a variety of weapons, ranging from Pistols to Assault Rifles. Explore to look for survivors, health kits and hidden zones. If you die, you have to start over just like the real deal!

name: Dead Profit
description: A war rages between hell and what's above, your job is to supply magical weapons to the war effort. Orders come in and you must Mine, Craft and Enchant the weapons in time. Your production can be ENDLESSLY upgraded and optimized, paired with randomly generated orders to fill!

name: Zombie City
description: Zombie City is a game developed exclusively for virtual reality in the shooter genre. Zombie City immerses you in the very epicenter of the zombie apocalypse. This game will take you headlong into a post-apocalyptic world where you will need to shoot zombies.

name: Dreamvibe
description: Dreamvibe is an interactive audiovisual experience where you use your blade to blow the fluids of music vibes as they come flying at you. Every beat has its direction you need to match.

name: Mario Bros.
description:
A remake of Mario Bros. is included in every Super Mario Advance game, as well as Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga. All of these games can connect to each other to play Classic or Battle mode with up to four players. Classic is based on the co-op mode from the original and uses the Japanese arcade phase system. Battle is based on the Battle Game from Super Mario All-Stars. The remake also uses the GBA's Single-Pak multiplayer feature. It can connect and play with other GBA systems without the game, although Battle is the only multiplayer mode that can be played in this way.

The GBA remake of Mario Bros. enhances the graphics to take advantage of the GBA's 32-bit capabilities, including adding backgrounds to the stages. It also adds new movement options and better aerial controls.

name: Z-Warp
description: Z-Warp is an intense vertical shoot'em up presented in retro pixel art style, featuring frenetic arcade-inspired action where blasters, bombs and killer specials are your only allies. Shoot down demonic enemies as they try to overwhelm your ship with bullet hell salvos and turn the tide of battle by charging your killer weapon capable of instantly wiping out anything in a tight radius around your ship! Face massive boss abominations and aim for high scores in Story or Endless modes.

name: Pretty Girls Rivers
description: Compete with Pretty Girls in the puzzle game "Rivers"!Find and eliminate the paired tiles within the time limit.You can get various costumes of beautiful girls by clearing each stage.Aim, complete the costume!

name: Neko Secret Room
description: Sneak into your photographer friend's room and find out what she’s hiding! Neko Secret Room is a naughty action puzzler where you have to solve the grid-based brain teasers of ChanOS to hack into a database of saucy photos. Select pieces of each image and swap them around to discover the correct combination and restore the completed scene. The lovely clients shown within are surely worth the effort!

name: Seven Pirates H
description: Seven Pirates H is a traditional RPG focused on exploration and discovery with a gigantic dose of fanservice thrown in! As Parute, you'll command your party of monster girls in combat against naughty enemies, exploiting weaknesses to gain the upper hand in turn-based combat. Adventure across islands in 3D and ride Otton to reach secret areas, gather items and enhance your abilities as you level up! With the special "Booby Training" system, you can control the bust size of the all-female crew for stat boosts, bigger for increased power and defense or smaller for improved speed and agility!

name: Penguin Hunting
description: Penguin Hunting - 2d platformer, in the role of a penguin you need to collect all the fish on the level and take them to the house. Beware of eagles and bears, each of them is a mortal danger for you. Develop a strategy and complete all levels.

name: Zombie Crush Driver
description: You are the last living person on earth, take a wheelbarrow and try to survive, fight your way through the crowds of zombies and find a way out of the city

name: Deliver Us From Evil: Cadenza
description: Deliver Us From Evil: Cadenza includes the man you wanted to date but couldn't — the elusive and striking Lord Keldran. His route comes as a polygamous romance option with bad boy, Ace. Capture the hearts of two hot men through a whirlwind of passion and mystery.

name: MS: Space Express
description: MS: Space Expressis a miniscape-style casual game. Players play the role of space couriers, earn money by reselling private goods after completing business orders, and experience the joy of space delivery.

name: Badlanders
description: The Red Beach Shelter once housed the world's most advanced weapon tech. However, it was short-lived as war broke out. The only things left on that beach are massive ruins, competing scavengers, and endless opportunities... Gear up and get ready to enter the hot zone of riches and danger!

name: Yum Collector
description:
Deciding to change your life dramatically, you take care of a little dog from a shelter, but bad luck - he is constantly very hungry!

Tidy up your kitchen by matching identical treats together to feed your ravenous pet in this quirky version of the mahjong connect game. Connect and remove pairs, use hints and shuffle the playing field if the combinations are over and save the dog from hunger!

name: Late Photographer 3
description: This is a game of drawing cards and collecting cards.

name: The Time Watcher
description: Sin descripción

name: Rtisatto City Defender
description: This is an intense combat game inspired by the classics of the 80s, mixing defense of towers and ships with 2D arcade. Defend the cities of a primitive planet from attacks by space pirates using a mobile artillery cannon.

name: Lunacid
description: Lunacid is a first person dungeon crawler inspired by old FROMSOFT games like Shadow Tower and King’s Field.

name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service: Deluxe Edition
description:
Everything you need to be a Totally Reliable Delivery Service person! Includes, Totally Reliable Delivery Service, Cyberfunk, Stunt Sets, and Dress Code.

Buckle up your back brace and fire up the delivery truck, it's time to deliver! Join up to three of your friends and haphazardly get the job done in an interactive sandbox world. Delivery attempted, that's a Totally Reliable Delivery Service guarantee!

Deluxe Edition includes:
- Totally Reliable Delivery Service
- Dress Code DLC
- Stunt Sets DLC
- Cyberfunk DLC

name: Narrative Adventure
description: Narrative Adventure is a game in which the player has to discover the mysteries of the house, solve riddles

name: Combat Space Journey
description: Combat Space Journey is a very beautiful game exploring space and space battles all in one game. You would have so much fun.

name: Hurdles
description: Sin descripción

name: Trains.io
description: Sin descripción

name: Ballotron
description: Sin descripción

name: Marbles Garden
description:
Marbles Garden is match-3 marble shooter puzzle.

Your goal is to protect your beautiful garden against evil golems. Special projectiles and other bonuses, which you can upgrade during the game for collected stars, will also help you with that.

name: Twin Circle
description: Test your skill with twin circle, the ultimate strategy, fast paced game were you need a lot of skill to hit the target every time!

name: Mekabolt+
description: Use your wit to solve the puzzling levels and fix the robots!

name: Roguebook: Deluxe Edition
description: Embrace the challenge of a roguelike deckbuilder with unique mechanics from the developers of Faeria and Richard Garfield, creator of Magic: The Gathering. Build a team of two heroes, unleash powerful combos and defeat the legends of the Roguebook!

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
description: Create your Guardian and embark on a cinematic story in an evolving universe filled with a variety of co-op missions and PvP modes.

name: The Anacrusis: Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle contains the base version of The Anacrusis and The Anacrusis Infinity Pass.

name: Demonic Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

- Demon Hunter: Ascendance

- The Secret Order: Return to the Buried Kingdom

- Endless Fables: Dark Moor

name: Thea Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: StickType Remastered
description: Includes the updated StickType game along with all three new DLCs: StickLady, Challenge, and Colors.

name: Evil Dead: The Game - Deluxe Edition
description: Step into the shoes of Ash Williams or his friends from the iconic Evil Dead franchise and work together in a game loaded with over-the-top co-op and PVP multiplayer action! The Deluxe Edition of Evil Dead: The Game includes Season Pass 1

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Deluxe Edition
description: Tokyo's population has vanished, and deadly supernatural forces prowl the streets. Use an arsenal of elemental abilities to unravel the truth behind the disappearance and save Tokyo.

name: Martha Is Dead: Digital Deluxe
description: Martha Is Dead is a dark first-person psychological thriller, set in 1944 Italy, that blurs the lines between reality, superstition and the tragedy of war.

name: Parkitect: Deluxe Edition
description: Parkitect Deluxe is the best way to get Parkitect! It contains: The base game. The Taste of Adventure DLC, with 10 levels, new rides and new themes! The Booms & Blooms DLC, with the effect sequencer, fireworks, and more new rides and decorations!

name: Love's Power Mahjong
description: Put your Mahjong skills to the test and save Ariel's fiancé, Tarlan, from captivity by the evil wizard Cornwall! Stolen from the altar on their wedding day, poor Tarlan has been taken deep into the Country of Four Seasons. Meet a whole cast of crazy characters as you help Ariel go on an exciting journey and explore the world of Love's Power Mahjong! Can you track down Tarlan and defeat Cornwall before it's too late?

name: Flying Fish Quest
description: Dolly, the little fish and Tim, her sea-horse friend live in a beautiful undersea world. Dolly is a flying fish and likes to fly out of the water to enjoy the warmth of the sun. One day, it suddenly grows darker right in the middle of the day! As the darkness sets in, Dolly and Tim become more and more concerned. Help them on their journey to save their beloved lagoon and overcome many puzzles and obstacles along the way!

name: Showdown
description: 1 or 2 player c64 action shooter!

name: Rogue64
description:
Rogue64 is a modern roguelike for the Commodore 64. Every play of the game is a unique experience, with our procedural generated levels. As you progress in the game you will meet tougher monsters and bigger challenges, but if you reach the end, there are wonderful rewards to be gathered!

Rogue64 is based on Rogue4k, a minimalistic Rogue-ish game in under 4000 bytes we made for The C64 'Cassette 50' Charity Competition hosted by Bitmap Soft.

name: Ablaze Ascent
description: A speedrunning-focused vertical precision platformer

name: Overlapped
description: A first person puzzle game where you mix overlapping realities.

name: Shepherd
description: Watch over the flock!

name: Quest of Graal DX
description: Racing platformer with splitscreen multiplayer

name: Toastling
description: To a Starling, but it's a mean map mod.

name: Cellings
description: Experience the full evolution of cells across 3 generations and explore breathtaking worlds.

name: Feral
description: A first person hunting and survival game for Windows

name: Structus
description: Discover-Explore-Look Sci-Fi platformer in a forgotten dimension

name: In the Mountains
description: A journey into an abandoned facility nestled deep within a mountain.

name: Winter Sports Games: 4K Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Boris the Sloth
description: Channel your inner sloth in this challenging nature-based puzzle platforming adventure game. Transition between the world of the living and the spirit realm where you will use your abilities to move objects, alter gravity, and warp time in order to solve puzzles and fight off dangerous animals.

name: Bowman 2
description: Become a master of archery in Bowman 2! You need to define the shooting angle and aim carefully. Your mission is to eliminate the opponent by successfully hitting them. Have fun!

name: Garden Madness
description: Garden Madness - A game in the style of "Hit the Mole", by pressing certain buttons at a certain moment, we beat the moles emerging from their holes to dynamic music, collecting points and bonuses for successful hits in a row.

name: Oraxum Trials
description: Oraxum Trials is an incremental/idle game where you conduct experiments with the Oraxum, a hexagonal board with magical properties. Harvest souls and use mystical crystals to create wild concoctions. Take on the mantle of soul alchemist and forge your fate, choosing between light and dark forces.

name: A Legend In Zormore
description: A tale of courage and friendship. Catch creatures called Zelds. Raise them. Train them. Use them for battle! You will be aided by your deck of cards, built around your own strategy. Can you overcome the challenge and save the world?

name: Tinker & Spell
description: Capture elemental spirits to add to your arsenal and uncover the mysteries of a fantasy land in this hand-drawn Creature-Collecting Metroidvania.

name: Wordies
description: Wordies is bringing a word game you've most likely played & enjoyed to Steam. But it's harder than before, with only 5 guesses you're given the not so easy task of guessing a common American word! Guess the daily word & build up highstreaks to compete against the world in our global leaderboards!

name: The Office Type
description: Add love to your resume! Date a wide variety of characters at once and explore dozens of narratives in this office-themed comedy dating sim.

name: Let's go to the moon
description: It is a 2D platform casual arcade game that succeeds when you step on a block from the ground and reach the moon. Will you be able to go up to the moon?

name: Transcendence Legacy: Voidswept
description: Uncover the truth behind a world plagued by monstrosities. Traverse through mysterious ruins to search for the answer with dependable allies at your side.

name: Push Ops
description: PushOps is a roguelike with a twist: There are no weapons! As a player, you must manipulate physics objects to survive. Fast moving blocks will deal damage.

name: Momo is Here
description: The doors are locked, no one answers and definitely won't help. Your task is to get out and not let yourself be caught! Solve puzzles, escape from Momo's persecution and get out of this nightmare!

name: Paper Wizards
description: an exciting fast-paced first person action game with bullet-hell mechanics that make you feel like a powerful wizard. You get to plan your approach and then test your skills in combat and platforming situations.

name: Witch Club
description: Fall in love with three eccentric witches and one mischievous fairy as you battle alongside them as a cursed skull! Help them grow and come to terms with their past as they feast, drink, and fight to fulfill their dreams!

name: Wayward Harbor
description: Short first-person horror experience with a unique mirror mechanic. Escape from an invisible monster that can be only seen in the reflection.

name: Parkonauts
description: Parkonauts is a physics-based co-op game for one to four players. Park cars, refuel and wash them to collect money for the next day!

name: Mupple
description: A colorful and animated world starring sweet animals and 2D Platformer focused on obstacles and challenges seems to be a perfect mix for... Deadly traps, absurd challenges and an insane adventure. Help Bilbo on his quest to retrieve the fruits from the forest and return home

name: Being Loved
description: It's valentine again, but I have company this year. This is a short casual simulation game, dive into the fantasy of a man, make money and give your promise to your beloved one.

name: Project Xenoflora
description: Someone thought it was a good idea to create the world's first sentient plant. It wasn't. Now there's a mildly dangerous and very angry plant making a mad dash for the exit, the only thing that stands in its way is the near-infinite number of mass-produced robot sentries programmed to destroy it.

name: Deep Space Outpost
description: Deep Space Outpost is a space station building & survival game, involving resource and base management. Build your space station tile by tile, mine asteroids, refine materials and keep your station operational.

name: Vesp: a History of Sapphic Scaphism
description: This is a vespo-sapphic pesticidepunk UV romance thriller

name: Marble Maid
description: A cutie in a maid uniform prepares to tackle her dirtiest job yet! In this puzzle ball adventure, you’ll control the adorable maid as she rolls around a larger-than-life estate and clears away the dust bunnies plaguing each room. Chase down and eliminate at least 3 dust bunnies and roll to the goal before time is up, and you’ll clear the stage!

name: Bibots
description: Bibots is a top-down shooter rogue lite set in a futuristic world. Play as Tayar, an explorer in control of a nervy robot and clear rooms filled with monsters, powers and secrets to unveil. Die, try and repeat until you face your world’s final threat.

name: Monster Master
description: Monster Master is a role-playing card game where you'll have to defeat your rival by summoning all kinds of creatures.

name: RogueClick
description: RogueClick is an incremental RPG where you fight creatures, unlock equipment, and vanquish bosses! Click to swing your mighty sword and slay mystical creatures that drop coins and gems. These resources enable you to unlock new equipment to become stronger! Complete quests and play Endless mode to amass even more wealth!

name: Victorian Debutante
description: Simple visual novel in which you play as a young upperclass woman preparing for her debut before the Queen and her royal relatives. All of your decisions lead to one of four very different endings. Who will you become? The jewel of the season or the outcast, never again mentioned by your family?

name: Adventure Trip: Wonders of the World
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you. Take an Adventure Trip to Wonders of The World.

name: Axiom of Maria
description: Axiom of Maria is a fast-paced, unconventional action-adventure game with an intriguing story set in Seoul, 2074.

name: A Moustache in the House 2
description: This time you have to escape Moustache's House

name: Ruins & Switch
description: A fun retro puzzle-platformer game in which you explore ancient ruins with a unique gameplay. By switching the void and solid blocks, build your way to the end of the levels.

name: Cat Follow Me
description: Cat Action Adventure! Find lost cats in the forest and bring them home!

name: Outshine
description: Unleash your powers against your oppressors in this arcade, fast-paced typing game. Avoid traps, destroy enemies, defeat bosses to seek your revenge, and rush to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Underworld Dreams: The False King
description: Underworld Dreams: The False King is the first game in the Underworld Dreams Anthology - the first-person horror series based in the Lovecraftian mythos. Inspired by the works of Lovecraft and Robert W Chambers and set in the 1980s, it sets the stage for the Underworld Dreams experience.

name: MageRun
description: Fight as a magician in this ever-growing project in fantastic worlds against monsters. Collect new spells, get stronger and defeat bosses. No story, just fun gameplay.

name: Hobble
description: Hobble is a 1-8 player hiking game. Take control of a senior citizen setting off on a bucket list trip.

name: Atomic Cyclecar Racing
description: Atomic Cyclecar Racing is a sci-fi arcade racing game inspired by games like Extreme-G, Beetle Adventure Racing, and F-Zero.

name: Gensokyo Odyssey
description: A satirical visual novel/RPG with live action parts and a script both written by a madman.

name: Westmark Legacy
description: This gothic horror adventure RPG returns with a twist! The usual exploration of dark terror, is accompanied by deck building card game mechanics for encounters surrounded by mystery and the occult. Collect clues and solve mysteries along the way that will challenge even the sharpest minds.

name: Starboard
description: Build a base or raid someone else's in this fantasy pirate survival game.

name: SpacePom
description: Join space-faring Pomeranian SpacePom on a mission to investigate a derelict spaceship. Using only your trusty jetpack and toolbox, make your way through the spaceship Halen in this sci-fi platformer and find answers along the way.

name: Gaucho and the Grassland
description: Gaucho and the Grassland is an Animal Farm Sim game where you need to gather resources, explore the land, breed animals and much more, to overcome the challenging life on the grasslands. The world of Gaucho is a mystical wildland, inspired by South Brazil's culture and its local tales.

name: Daydreamer 2
description: Sci-fi 3rd person hack n slash with a classic top-down tank shooter component.

name: End Party
description: Can you keep 5 characters alive for one hour? Whack zombies. Barricade doors. Lead NPCs around. And smash stuff!

name: Mini Island: Aroma
description: Mini Island: Aroma is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Lonely Tribes
description: Merge all of the people together!

name: Feed the Pets: Fall Animals
description: Feed the Pets: Fall Animals is a cute clicker where you shall feed the pets, and make them happy!
